description:
Syncing, backing up, and sharing your files in total privacy couldnâ€™t be easier.
With Internxt Drive we focus on user-friendly encrypted storage with military-grade
encryption, so only you have control over your files and data.


Release 2.5.1
Highlights:
- Backup Stability Improved: Addressed and resolved critical errors in the backup process.
- Enhanced Account Context Separation: Implemented robust separation of data between different accounts, ensuring file integrity during login and logout.
- Optimized Initial Load Time: Significantly improved the application's startup performance.
- Gateway Migration: All server queries have been migrated to the gateway, enhancing response reliability.
